title: Strategically Located
subTitle:
Kakamega County is located in Western Kenya near
Lake Victoria, the largest fresh water Lake in Africa.

title: Market potential
subTitle: Kakamega has a population of 1.8m which offers ready market for goods and services produced within and neighboring counties which have high population.

title: Investor Support and Incentives
subTitle: The County has established an Investment Development Agency to guide investors through the investment process.
